channel.title: 508 coding :D
channel.description: Hello MoparScape Members. I Have Been Having A Problem Coding My 508. I Want To Edit My Quest Tab. So I can Write What I Want It To Say. This is What I Need Help With: Like On Quest Tab It Says Master And When You Click It You Become Maxed Stat. Also if u can tell me like Whip (adds items) home (teles You) Thanks you i appreciate it!

item.title: 508 coding :D
item.dc:creator: @mlgsnipe mlgsnipe
item.description:
@mlgsnipe wrote:

i’m still kinda confused, but thanks for trying.
It would be great if there was a tut for this.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 coding :D
item.dc:creator: @thebigpurpleglob thebigpurpleglob
item.description:
@thebigpurpleglob wrote:

To be honest, I’m not sure and i’m bumping the topic by posting this aswell because I want to help you get this fixed…
But… if you have a windows 7/Vista then you can go to your client files > Search then type in your current quest tab text and a file should pop up, then all you have to do is click Edit > Find > “Quest Tab Text” > Edit to what you want it to say (I can’t help you with the leveling part sorry!) Then compile.
i’ve never coded a 525 so I can’t help you with the rest but I do know that should work for the text part…

Read full topic
